name: here AND there
detailed_description:
What will it be If you touch the umbrella? What happens when you grab the dog’s nose?

Touch the screen and let’s move back and forth in a relaxing day at the house, town, and the sea! Enjoy the world of “here AND there” by artist Komitsu, filled with plenty of adorable events and exciting events.

*features
・hand-drawn animation by a sign pen
・touchable about 20 points in each landscape
・some happenings are connected to each other
・there is no ending but the sunset
・enjoy the relaxing music

short_description: What will it be If you touch the umbrella? What happens when you grab the dog’s nose? Touch the screen and let’s move back and forth in a relaxing day at the house, town, and the sea! Enjoy the world of “here AND there” by artist Komitsu, filled with plenty of adorable events and exciting events.
reviews:
“A wonderful piece that reminds players of the primitive "fun of discovery" and "familiarity of discovery"”
AUTOMATION

“This is a wonderful work that brings back the memories of us early days, when we were growing up and forgotten, and there was a lot of wonder in our everyday life.”
IGN JAPAN

“It was a lovely piece that made me feel like I want to live like this.”
MIKAN
